page.title: 14LOCAL SCHOOL, SEAMILL (2)
page.content:
contd.
The{main building}holds from P1 to P6. The P7 classes are in{huts}outside. There are about{500 pupils}in the school altogether and every year pupils from{P7}leave for one of the local{secondary schools,}mainly Ardrossan Academy. We get play times at 10.40a.m. and 2.30p.m. Lunchtime is from 12.20p.m. till 1.30p.m. We go home at 3.35p.m. When the new school was built I think it should have been made a lot larger. All three P7 classes use the huts because it wasn't made large enough. Most of the teachers prefer to work in the huts because it is much noisier in the new school but some teachers don't mind either way. I like the huts better for the same reason.
